plugin

Class PluginFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • plugin.PluginFinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class PluginFinder
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    The class PluginFinder will be the class that takes all files that are conform to filters and launches methods that will create items in the tool and help menu.
    Author:
    Thomas OSTROWSKI - Valentin BOMY
